TIGERS THANKS: Why Detroit Fans PRAISE Tarik Skubal as MLB'S BEST and Relish Playoffs
To stream WHAS11 on your phone, you need the WHAS11 app.
Download the WHAS11 app
Scott Bentley celebrates Thanksgiving by discussing what Detroit Tigers fans can be thankful for, including Tarik Skubal, playoff runs, and prospects.
